events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been classified under the Refund cluster based on the customer's request for money back.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request for the wrong item received.
Hello, Iâ€™m Sarah from customer support. I understand you want a refund for the incorrect product sent.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund?
Here is my order number 987654 and attached a photo clearly showing the wrong product delivered to me.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thanks for the prompt response. I appreciate the quick refund offer and look forward to the resolution.
The refund process has been completed and the money should appear on your account shortly. Please let us know if you have any further issues.
Checking in to confirm your refund was received and if you are satisfied with the resolution of your case.
I have received the refund successfully. Thank you for your help and professionalism throughout the process.
Closing this support case as the refund has been successfully processed and confirmed by the customer.
